info.title: Represents a request for deleting a Chat.

method.name: fromEngine
method.description: Creates a new DeleteChatRequest with data retrieved from the "engine".

parameter.name: $chatId
parameter.description: The ID of the Chat to be deleted.

parameter.name: $deleteIfEmpty
parameter.description:
A value of "true" indicates that the Chat should be deleted only if it is empty.
See the DeleteChatFormBuilder::buildDeleteChatIfEmptyField method for the definition of an empty Chat.

method.name: getChatId
method.returndescription: The ID of the Chat to be deleted.

method.name: isDeleteIfEmpty
method.returndescription:
A value of "true" indicates that the Chat should be deleted only if it is empty.
See the DeleteChatFormBuilder::buildDeleteChatIfEmptyField method for the definition of an empty Chat.
